attributes.action: Reduce the minimum amount of school days in secondary schools from 190 to 170
attributes.additional_details:
Our young boys and girls need more of a rest during the summer holiday.Many other secondary schools in other countries have two months or even 3 months for their holidays.When they come back they are way better in terms of hitting their targets right away whereas our students are not.I know this from experience as a teacher in Macedonia where they had a 3 month holiday and in the USA where they had 2 months and a half.

Thank you very much for taking your time towards a Greater Britain.
